responses: Ok, starting a new order. You can say things like I want two Pizzas and one Apple Pie. Make sure to specify a quantity for every food item! Also, we have only the following items on our menu: Hamburger, Hot dog, Pizza, French Fries, Chicken nuggets, Pancakes, Nachos, Apple pie, and Donuts.

Starting new order. Specify food items and quantities. For example, you can say, I would like to order two Pizzas and one Apple Pie. Also, we have only the following items on our menu: Hamburger, Hot dog, Pizza, French Fries, Chicken nuggets, Pancakes, Nachos, Apple pie, and Donuts.
We accept VISA, Mastercard and Paypal
We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal
You can pay through Cash On Delivery
